achievements: Win a match with a five-color deck
Win a match after mulliganing to five or less
Win a match with 5 or fewer creatures in your main deck
Win a match after casting the same spell at least 3 times
Win a match without playing any rare or mythic cards
Win a match while ending the game at 30+ life
Win a match with a monocolored deck
Win a match without reducing your opponent to 0 life (mill, poison, alt wincon)
